text: Baye babimisama na bandako na bango na bobubami bonso, pamba te bango balobaki ete: Allah azali Nkolo wa biso, soki Allah azongisaka bato kati kati na bango te, batempelo mpe ba eclesia mpe ba sinagoga mpe ba mas√¢djid bisika oyo bakundolaka mingi nkombo ya Allah, elingaki ebeba Allah apesaka lisungi na oyo azali kosunga ye (Allah).
